omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	b.BirthWeightBaby as BirthWeight
from [omop_staging].[sus_APC] apc
	inner join [omop_staging].[sus_Birth] as b
		on apc.MessageId = b.MessageId
where b.BirthWeightBaby is not null
  and apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate,
	b.BirthWeightBaby;

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	b.BirthWeightBaby as BirthWeight
from [omop_staging].[sus_APC] apc
	inner join [omop_staging].[sus_Birth] as b
		on apc.MessageId = b.MessageId
where b.BirthWeightBaby is not null
  and apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate,
	b.BirthWeightBaby;

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber
dataSource.description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	b.BirthWeightBaby as BirthWeight
from [omop_staging].[sus_APC] apc
	inner join [omop_staging].[sus_Birth] as b
		on apc.MessageId = b.MessageId
where b.BirthWeightBaby is not null
  and apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate,
	b.BirthWeightBaby;

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `3662222`. Weight of neonate at birth

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `38000280`. Observation recorded from EHR

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: BirthWeight
dataSource.description: BIRTH WEIGHT is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the Birth Weight, where the UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is Grams (g).

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	b.BirthWeightBaby as BirthWeight
from [omop_staging].[sus_APC] apc
	inner join [omop_staging].[sus_Birth] as b
		on apc.MessageId = b.MessageId
where b.BirthWeightBaby is not null
  and apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate,
	b.BirthWeightBaby;
